description:
Travel has changed: endless security, 24/7 connectivity and “can’t live without” devices have made the world smaller yet more complicated. MEC’s trustworthy Pangea packs have also changed: nimble, secure and ready to stash your tech. Whether you want to disappear or connect, the Pangea 60 will be your closest travel companion.

  • Full suspension system with air mesh and perforated foam for breathability
  • 40L main pack + the 20L day pack is enough space for a seasoned traveller to hit the road for months at a time
  • Removable day pack can attach using the hip and sternum strap or the main pack's compression straps
  • Zippered strap cover stows in the base of the pack
  • Dedicated external laptop/tablet pocket is against the back for protection
  • External padding to protect your gear
  • External and internal compression straps
  • Back panel pocket for quick access to shoes/sandals or dirty/wet items
  • Integrated rain cover
  • 2 large grab handles on the top and side
name: MEC Pangea 60 Travel Pack - Unisex
